dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Welcome to JobE HR Management Platform
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Welcome to JobE - HR Management Platform

noOrg.title: Create your first organization
noOrg.description: To get started, create an organization. You can add positions and invite teammates afterwards.

errors.generic: Failed to create organization. Please try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.managePreferences: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.pleaseLogIn: Please log in to access settings.

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.emailCannotChange: Email cannot be changed here. Use the Email section below.

email.title: Change Email
email.changeDescription: Change your email address. A verification email will be sent to the new address.
email.success: Verification email sent! Please check your new email address.
email.required: Please enter a new email address

password.title: Change Password
password.description: Ensure your account is using a strong password
password.changeDescription: Change your password to keep your account secure
password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.allFieldsRequired: Please fill in all password fields

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
deleteAccount.warningDescription: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.

dialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.

settings.comingSoon: Display name updates will be available soon

errors.orgSwitchFailed: Failed to switch organization. Please try again.
errors.translationLoadFailed: Failed to load translations. Please refresh the page.
errors.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to access this resource.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Error ID: {errorId}

login.title: Sign in to your account
login.description: Enter your email and password to access your account
login.error: Failed to sign in. Please check your credentials.

rateLimit.title: Account Temporarily Locked
rateLimit.message: Too many failed login attempts. Please try again in {time}.

register.title: Create your account
register.success: Account created successfully! Please check your email to verify.
register.error: Failed to create account. Please try again.
register.emailVerificationNotice: You'll need to verify your email address before you can log in.

emailStep.title: Enter your email
emailStep.description: We will send you a link to reset your password
emailStep.success: Reset link sent! Check your email.

passwordStep.title: Set new password
passwordStep.success: Password reset successfully! You can now log in.

verifyEmail.title: Verify your email
verifyEmail.description: We've sent a verification link to your email address

pending.title: Check your email
pending.message: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Click the link to verify your account.
pending.checkSpam: Can't find the email? Check your spam folder or request a new verification email.

success.title: Email verified!
success.message: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.

error.title: Verification failed
error.message: We couldn't verify your email. The link may have expired or is invalid.

verifyEmail.verificationFailed: Email verification failed. Please try again.

logout.confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.weakPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email before signing in
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
errors.userNotFound: No account found with this email
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unknown: An error occurred. Please try again.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

captcha.error: Security check failed. Please try again.
captcha.expired: Security check expired. Please try again.
captcha.failed: reCAPTCHA verification failed. Please try again.

sessionExpired.title: Session Expired
sessionExpired.defaultMessage: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue.
